sentences.english: A white light flashed, lit the sky in silver.
sentences.chinese: 一道白光閃起，夜空亮起銀輝。

sentences.english: It appears as a dusty, cloud-line across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 跨過夜空眼前是一條星星點點雲霧線。

sentences.english: Ever looked up at the night sky and wondered: What is up there?
sentences.chinese: 你可曾仰望夜空，思索着上面到底有什麼？

sentences.english: You eyes are two pools that twinkle like starts in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 你的雙眼是兩汪清泉，就像那夜空中閃爍的星。
火箭閃閃發光升入夜空。

sentences.english: Meteor finished with the long-tail again across the dark night sky.
sentences.chinese: 說完流星帶着長長的光尾再次劃過漆黑的夜空。

sentences.english: I stole one last glance out the window.
sentences.chinese: 我最後瞄了一眼窗外的夜空。

sentences.english: The white - washed wall is brilliant against the dark-blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 寶藍色的夜空下，它的那垛牆漂白如玉，光采熠熠。

sentences.english: They looked up at the night sky as they snuggled .
sentences.chinese: 他們依偎在一起，仰望着夜空。

sentences.english: We can see neither Altair or Ursa Major in the cloudy night sky.
sentences.chinese: 陰天的夜空既看不到牛郎星，也看不到北斗星。

sentences.english: Searchlights are sweeping in the night sky.
The sky was full of stars dancing and twinkling.
sentences.chinese: 夜空繁星點點，璀璨閃爍。

sentences.english: Saturn still shines in the night though, farther eastward along the ecliptic plane.
sentences.chinese: 而沿着黃道平面朝更遠的東方，土星仍在夜空中閃亮。

sentences.english: Under star sky, three big shadows, a suddenly evaporate in the night sky.
sentences.chinese: 星空下，三個大影子，一忽就消失在夜空中。

sentences.english: Looking at the night sky, bright stars who don't admire infinite universe?
sentences.chinese: 遙望星光燦爛的夜空，誰不讚嘆宇宙的無窮？

sentences.english: With the lights of the city extinguished, stars shone brightly in the night sky.
sentences.chinese: 城市的燈光熄滅之際，夜空中閃爍着點點繁星。

definition: many stars/a vast sky full of stars
night scene/the dim light of night
